üíª Algorithm Code
function binarySearch(nums, target) {
let left = 0;
let right = nums.length - 1;
while (left <= right) {
const mid = left + Math.floor((right - left) / 2);
if (nums[mid] === target) {
return mid; // Found!
} else if (nums[mid] < target) {
left = mid + 1; // Search right
} else {
right = mid - 1; // Search left
}
}
return -1; // Not found
}
